participant_1.background:
I'm not rich, but I'm passionate about my writing and I'm learning more about my heritage every day.
my favorite place is the beach.
i plan to raise hell and sew my wild oats.
i have a cat named jasper.
I'm going to watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube and study for my upcoming exams.

participant_2.background:
I love to play with my cat Mater when I have free time.
I am not too concerned with my appearance, but I do like to look my best for my girlfriend.
i cannot eat them but they are pretty.
I am a single lady who loves chai tea and knitting.
my family comes first to me.

content.text: Hey, what are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out with Mater, my cat.
Nice, I have a cat named Jasper. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to knit, drink chai tea, and spend time with my family. How about you?
I like to write, go to the beach, and spend time with my friends.
Sounds like we have a lot in common! What are you studying in school?
I'm studying English literature. I want to be a writer.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thanks, I hope so. What do you do for work?
I'm a barista at a local coffee shop.
Oh, that sounds fun. I love coffee.
Me too! It's the best way to start the day.
I agree. So what's your favorite book?
That's a tough question. I have a lot of favorites.
Me too. I like to read all kinds of books.
I like to read mostly fiction, but I also like some nonfiction.
What's your favorite nonfiction book?
I really enjoyed the book "The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks."
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
It's really good. It's about a woman who donated her cells without knowing it, and how those cells have been used to develop medical treatments.
That sounds really interesting. I'll definitely have to check it out.
I hope you like it.
